text: Forbes was a Swedish dansband of the 1970s.Swedishcharts The band represented Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest in 1977, with the entry "Beatles". The song is about the British band The Beatles. Despite the popular topic of the song, Forbes ended in last place and received only two points. It was one of the worst placements ever for a Swedish entry at Eurovision. The band was made up of Peter Forbes, Roger Capello, Claes Bure, Peter Bj√∂rk, Anders Hector and Chino Mariano. ==References== ==Other websites== * Information about Forbes in 1977 * Forbes (in Swedish) Category:Dansbands Category:Swedish musical groups Category:1970s music groups Category:Musical groups established in the 1970s Category:1970s establishments in Sweden Category:Musical groups disestablished in the 1970s Category:20th-century disestablishments in Sweden Category:1970s disestablishments in Europe
title: Forbes (band)
